title: "How Will Self-Driving Cars Affect Cities Like Chicago?"
excerpt: "Self-driving cars are spreading out across the country, and you may see one yourself on the Kennedy or Dan Ryan Expressway soon. CBS News’ Laura Podesta has a report, and DePaul University Professor Joe Schwieterman talks with CBS 2’s Jim Williams and Marie Saavedra about how self-driving cars will affect big cities like Chicago."
